field.name: summary
field.value: Failure to proxy some classed after changes in connection with DYNPROXY-55

field.name: description
field.value:
After svn:4038 (and related checkins) DynamicProxy2 now throws an InvalidOperationException in ModuleScope.cs with the text "Both a strong-named and a weak-named assembly have been generated." whenever it tries to proxy my classes.
This used to work before and If I revert DP2 back to 4035 (before the recent DYNPROXY-55 changes) it works again.
I'm doing nothing special in my code. I have a few facilities and components which are loaded from an XML-configuration. Some are using class proxies and others are using interface proxies. None are placed in a strong-named assembly and I'm not trying to save the generated assemblies.
